Key Match Events: Dennis Man scores in the 40th minute
Răzvan Marin scores a penalty in the 51st minute
Denis Drăguș scores in the 82nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Mircea Lucescu's new tenure as head coach of Romania's national team starts with a 3-0 win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Stadiumi Fadil Vokrri in Pristina
Others: The Romanian team was known as the ‘Tricolorii'
